name: Octopus.do
title: octopus.do
shortDescription: Octopus.do is a visual sitemap tool designed for both beginners and professionals in web development. It simplifies the process of website planning, content organization, and architecture exploration. Users can collaborate on content planning, sync designs with Figma, and even analyze SEO. The tool is ideal for those looking to create structured websites with clear navigation and export their plans to various formats.
pros: Exports to multiple formats and services
cons: May be too basic for complex web projects
Dependent on third-party integrations like Figma

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Dyno Mapper
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers advanced crawling and inventory features
